name: Chimeras: Cursed and Forgotten (Full) - Hidden
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

You decide to take a trip to Scotland for a welcomed vacation, and to find out more about your history. But what started as a personal journey quickly takes a sharp turn towards an even deeper mystery. You’ve been magically transported back through time, where one of your forgotten family members has been kidnapped before their wedding, and cursed by an evil Chimera to relive the same day over and over again!

• RESCUE YOUR KIN IN TIME FOR THE WEDDING
What happens if your ancestors never get married? If you fail, it could erase this entire branch of your family tree!

• THESE TANGLED ROOTS RUN DEEP!
Travel through the Scottish Highlands in a variety of beautiful hidden object scenes.

• CAN YOU SAVE YOUR FUTURE BY SAVING THE PAST?
Break the wicked spell by solving enchanted puzzles and mysterious mini-games.

• DISCOVER MORE OF YOUR HAUNTED PAST IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Uncover more family secrets and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Tarot Cards, morphing objects, and more!
